Enjoy the best of both world’s at one of South Yarra’s premier developments, Clara, enjoying urban convenience surrounded by the verdant sanctuary of Surrey Road Park. Two Dwellings on One Title
A rare period legacy in a sought after South Yarra locale, two substantial dwellings on the one title with multiple courtyard gardens and outdoor entertaining areas create a private oasis set on an elevated allotment (approx 522sqm) and located only moments to the Yarra River and Royal Botanic Gardens. This unique city offering is currently configured as two homes and a basement apartment, tried and tested as a successful rental with endless scope to create a versatile and truly remarkable family home or reap the rewards of this diverse investment opportunity on the city fringe. The front home includes an enclosed front porch, entrance foyer, front and rear courtyards, three generous and sunny bedrooms, an expansive central lounge/dining with period detailing, functional bathroom, kitchen with gas cooktop and a sizeable laundry/sunroom. The home to the rear incorporates four bedrooms flooded with natural light, lounge room with study or dining nook, bathroom, laundry plus a large kitchen/meals area opening to the extensive backyard with timber decking. The basement apartment with separate entrance offers a bedroom (BIRs), open plan gas kitchen, lounge, bathroom with WM facilities, separate toilet and a private courtyard. Further attributes include five carspaces between the homes including two separate carports for three cars, under-house storage, dishwasher and ducted heating/cooling.
